turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can I order pizzas from Bella Luna Pizzeria, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two thin crust pizzas medium. One pizza a veggie lovers pizza, and the second a meat lovers pizza with extra bacon and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 2 medium thin crust pizzas, 1 veggie lovers, 1 meatlovers with extra bacon and pepperoni, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $40, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I order for pickup, please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's about it. Thank you very much for your help.
